short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share status to Facebook or Twitter via NoLimit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine social network without boundaries. This is what NoLimit Button is for! Share seamlessly to Twitter and Facebook in no time using your NoLimit account.
